protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Binds to the cAMP response element and activates transcription

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity

reference.reference_text: Nomura N, Zu YL, Maekawa T, Tabata S, Akiyama T, Ishii S: Isolation and characterization of a novel member of the gene family encoding the cAMP response element-binding protein CRE-BP1. J Biol Chem. 1993 Feb 25;268(6):4259-66.
Zu YL, Maekawa T, Nomura N, Nakata T, Ishii S: Regulation of trans-activating capacity of CRE-BPa by phorbol ester tumor promoter TPA. Oncogene. 1993 Oct;8(10):2749-58.
